{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = DWR 118 A1 Image L Side.png |image1_size = 200px |caption = Wireless AC750 Dual-Band Multi-WAN Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.dlink.com/uk/en/products/dwr-118-wireless-ac750-dual-band-multi-wan-router |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = D-Link_DWR-118_rev_B1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DWR-118 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = B1 |subrevision = E |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC750 |series = DWR-118 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8881AM; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Lexra |cpu1_type_rev = RLX5281 |cpu1spd = 520<!-- 520 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6433F; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = A0:AB:1B |oui = A0:AB:1B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;;2.6.30.9;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, (38400, 8N1),, JP1 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = DWR-118_XXXXXX, DWR-118_5GHz_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-AC52 |manuf_rev = REV-A1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00PVDD7C4 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 150 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192ER; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = soldered |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Ports: *WAN: 1x FE (10/100) ports *LAN: 3x FE (10/100) + 1x GbE (10/100/1000) ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (3G/4G LTE modem backup support)
Antennas: *2x external 5dBi antennas (2.4/5 GHz) *1x internal 5dBi antenna (2.4 GHz)
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== *JP1 - 4-pin header (38400, 8N1)
{{/Serial info}}
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:DWR 118 A1 Image L Side.png| File:DWR 118 A1 Image L Front.png| File:DWR 118 A1 Image L Side Right.png| File:DWR 118 A1 Image L Back.png| File:Dwr 118 3dbox.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''[[User:Królik|Królik]]'s Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:DWR-118-B1.jpg|front File:DWR-118-B1-cover.jpg|cover File:DWR-118-B1-top.jpg|PCB top File:DWR-118-B1-bot.jpg|PCB bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== *[[D-Link DWR-116 rev A1]] - [[MediaTek]] MT7620N *[[D-Link DWR-118 rev A1]] - [[MediaTek]] MT7620A :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7610EN, LAN: 2x [[IC+]] IP1001 :FCC ID: KA2WR118A1 (03/23/2016), 12V/1.5A *[[D-Link DWR-118 rev A2]] - [[MediaTek]] MT7620A :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7612EN, LAN: 1x [[Marvell]] 88E1510 *D-Link DWR-118 rev B1 - [[Realtek]] RTL8881AM :WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8192ER, LAN: 1x RTL8211E *[[D-Link DIR-803 rev A1]] (WRG-AC08) RTL8881AQ *[[D-Link DIR-803 rev B1]] (WRG-AC33) RTL8881AN *[[D-Link DIR-809 rev A1]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8881AN *[[D-Link DIR-809 rev A2]] (WRG-AC27) RTL8881AN
